import React, { Component } from 'react' import Addressbar from './Addressbar' class ParcelSender extends Component { state = { recvData: {}, orderPrice: 0, startTime: 0, endTime: 0, orderWeight: 0, orderType: 0 } async componentDidMount() { let recvParam if (this.props.location && this.props.location.query) { //To see if parameters exist recvParam = this.props.location.query sessionStorage.setItem('recvData', JSON.stringify(recvParam)) // store recvParam in sessionStorage } else { recvParam = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('recvData')) } this.setState({ recvData: recvParam, }) console.log('recvParam', recvParam) } handleChange1 = (e) => { // 选择startTime this.setState({ startTime: e.target.value }) } handleChange2 = (e) => { // 选择endTime this.setState({ endTime: e.target.value }) } handleChange3 = (e) => { // 选择orderWeight this.setState({ orderWeight: e.target.value }) } handleChange4 = (e) => { // 选择orderType this.setState({ orderType: e.target.value }) } render() { return (

You Can Create Your Order Now!

{ }} >
{ this.senderName = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Sender Name" required />
{ this.senderPhone = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Sender Phone" required />
{ this.pickUpAddr = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Pick Up Address" required />
{ this.shippingAddr = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Shipping Address" required />
{ this.receiverName = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Receiver Name" required />
{ this.receiverPhone = input }} className="form-control" placeholder="Receiver Phone" required />
{ this.orderWeight = input }} onChange={this.caculatePrice} className="form-control" placeholder="Order Weight" required />

You Order Price: {this.state.orderPrice}

) } } export default ParcelSender
